chapter.name: bach Tutorial 16: Into The Matrix
chapter.subhead: An overview of the bach matrix calculus library
chapter.body: Having the possibility to define a list of lists (an llll of depth 2) means having the possibility to define a matrix. Indeed, bach has an extended library aimed to bring the power of the matrix calculus and linear algebra into Max. This tutorial will guide you through its discovery.
